entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
